CustomField.description: tracks the number of days a request is at the status of On Hold More Info Rqd based on working days
CustomField.formula: (Date_Removed_from_On_Hold_More_Info_Rq__c - Date_Status_Updated_to_On_Hold_Mr_Inf__c ) - ( FLOOR ( ( ( (Date_Removed_from_On_Hold_More_Info_Rq__c) - Date_Status_Updated_to_On_Hold_Mr_Inf__c ) / 7 ) ) * 2 ) + CASE(MOD ( Date_Status_Updated_to_On_Hold_Mr_Inf__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7), 0,CASE( MOD ((Date_Removed_from_On_Hold_More_Info_Rq__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,1,2 ), 1,CASE( MOD ((Date_Removed_from_On_Hold_More_Info_Rq__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,2,1 ), IF(MOD( Date_Status_Updated_to_On_Hold_Mr_Inf__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) - MOD((Date_Removed_from_On_Hold_More_Info_Rq__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) <= 0 ,0, IF(MOD((Date_Removed_from_On_Hold_More_Info_Rq__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) = 0,1,-2 ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: tracks the number of days a request is at the status of On Hold More Info Rqd based on working days
CustomField.label: No of Days - On Hold More Info Rqd
